message_1: What are the products of the decomposition of calcium carbonate (CaCO3) when it is heated at a high temperature? Write the balanced chemical equation for the reaction.
message_2:
When calcium carbonate (CaCO3) is heated at a high temperature, it decomposes into calcium oxide (CaO) and carbon dioxide (CO2). The balanced chemical equation for this reaction is:
